DaD.inventory

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • DaD.inventory.Inventory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeroInventory

    public abstract class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Clovis on 13/02/2017. Abstract Inventory class. Extended by HeroInventory
    See Also:
    ArrayList, ItemInstance

      • addItem

        public boolean addItem(ItemInstance item)
        Add an ItemInstance to the list of items.

        Here we check various condition before adding item. Function will return true if item was added to inventory.

        Parameters:
        item - The ItemInstance to add to inventory.
        Returns:
        boolean
